quote_last: “There he is,” Pierre Armont said, peering through the fog with his Tasco Infocus Zoom binoculars. They did not require focusing, and with a touch of a lever he jacked up the power from six to twelve. “I want the sucker myself. We missed him in Beirut, but this time . . .”
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_first: Kaldren pursues me like luminescent shadow. He has chalked up on the gateway ‘96,688,365,498,702’. Should confuse the mail man. Woke 9:05. To sleep
title: The Voices of Time
author: J.G. Ballard
